channel.title: Help please! [well explained] [317]

item.title: Help please! [well explained] [317]
item.dc:creator: @sikeo sikeo
item.description:
@sikeo wrote:

from my recent post on the npc handler thing i found out the problem

the problem was when i entered:

temp.sendMessage("You defeated the Abyssal Demon!l");

then i entered temp:addSkillXP(18, 1500);

I got a shitload of spam saying:
“You defeated the Abyssal Demon”
then freeze

then I removed temp.addSkillXP(18, 1500);
and it worked!

how can I have both temps on the same thing without screwing up my server? can someone please help me?

example:

if ((temp != null)  && (!temp.disconnected)) {
                                                       		if (npcs[i].npcType == 1) {
                                                        temp.sendMessage("You have defeated the Abyssal Demon!");
                                                        temp.addSkillXP(18, 1500);
                                                        
                                                        }

Read full topic
